message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $14,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it brings.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. However, I can't go below $13,000 and still make it worthwhile for me. How about we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your response, Alice. I'll consider the middle ground you've proposed. My counteroffer would be $12,500 for the product. I hope this suggestion will be more agreeable.
